    WBC Approves Vacant Title Fight Between Nonito Donaire and Alexandro Santiago

    Kevin Follow Feb 17, 2023 · 2 mins read
    Share this

    WBC Approves Vacant Title Fight Between Nonito Donaire and Alexandro Santiago





    It's official: the World Boxing Council (WBC) has approved the vacant title fight between Nonito Donaire and Alexandro Santiago. The date and location of the fight are still to be determined, but boxing fans around the world are eagerly anticipating this matchup.


    Nonito Donaire is a well-known Filipino-American boxer who has had a long and successful career in the sport. He is a former four-division world champion and is widely regarded as one of the best fighters of his generation. Alexandro Santiago, on the other hand, is a relatively unknown boxer from Mexico who has been making a name for himself in the sport over the past few years.


    The WBC's decision to approve this fight for the vacant title is exciting news for boxing fans, as it means that there will soon be a new champion in the super bantamweight division. The previous title holder, Luis Nery, vacated the belt in order to move up in weight class.


    Both Donaire and Santiago will be looking to make the most of this opportunity and prove that they have what it takes to be a world champion. Donaire has the advantage of experience and a proven track record of success, but Santiago is young and hungry and will no doubt be looking to make a name for himself in the sport.


    As of now, the date and location of the fight have not been announced, but the WBC has promised to provide updates as soon as they are available. It is expected that the fight will take place sometime in the next few months.


    Boxing fans around the world are eagerly anticipating this matchup, and it is sure to be an exciting and hard-fought battle between two skilled fighters. Whether you're rooting for Donaire or Santiago, one thing is for sure: this fight is not to be missed.


    Conclusion

    The WBC's approval of the vacant title fight between Nonito Donaire and Alexandro Santiago is exciting news for boxing fans everywhere. Both fighters will be looking to prove that they have what it takes to be a world champion, and it is sure to be an exciting and hard-fought battle. Stay tuned for more updates on the date and location of the fight, and be sure to tune in when it finally takes place.
